com.meterware.httpunit

Class WebApplet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.meterware.httpunit.WebApplet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HTMLElement

    public class WebApplet
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the embedding of an applet in a web page.
